features: VOLUME SHAMPOO + CONDITIONER: This award-winning Shampoo and Conditioner set helps deeply cleanse and lightly hydrate thin, fine and oily hair types. It contains Ginger Extract, Vitamin E and Coconut Oil to leave hair feeling invigorated and balanced.

SALON-QUALITY: Our modern formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. We instead use natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein and vitamin E to nourish and restore.

AWARD-WINNING: Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has 11 major beauty awards and counting, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award.

CERTIFIED CRUELTY-FREE: All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme by Cruelty Free International. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals.

100% RECYCLABLE BOTTLES: Not only do our little pink bottles look great in your shower, they’re made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill. A win for your hair and for the environment.
body.description: MONDAY Haircare VOLUME Shampoo and Conditioner set for women is good for oily hair, hair with product build-up and thin and fine hair types. It’s also safe for color-treated hair. This invigorating, deeply cleansing and lightly hydrating Shampoo and Conditioner helps to balance hair with Ginger Extract, Vitamin E and Coconut Oil—ingredients that help support hair health and maintain normal hair growth and thickness. MONDAY Haircare’s salon-quality Shampoo and Conditioner formulas are dermatologically tested, PH-balanced, and free from SLS, parabens and phthalates. They instead contain premium natural ingredients such as shea butter, coconut oil, rice protein, vitamin E and provitamin B5 to nourish and restore. Our range of Shampoo and Conditioner has close to a dozen major beauty awards, including a Cosmopolitan 2021 Holy Grail Beauty Award, Glamour 2021 Beauty Award, Cosmopolitan 2021 Beauty Award, and an InStyle 2022 Best Beauty Buy Award. MONDAY has also been featured by Vogue, ELLE, Harper’s BAZAAR, Allure, Refinery29 and Byrdie. All of MONDAY’s products are approved as cruelty-free under the Leaping Bunny programme. We’re also proud to be recognised by PETA as a brand that does not test on animals. Our pink bottles are also made from 100% recyclable plastic to help minimise carbon footprint and reduce landfill.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars so far so good!
reviews.reviewText: My hair is usually oily & i have tried alot of shampoos & i can not get my hair to be “normal”.. i am not even over exaggerating when i say i used this before a dinner at my parent in laws. Both my mother in law and sister in law asked me “did you dye your hair”, “did you get highlights”, “what did you do to your hair”. I simply told them “nothing just a new shampoo”. I am a natural blonde and if anyone knows natural blondes our hair gets dark in the winter. Right now over 12 hours of using it.. my hair is not greasy, its soft, its very voluminous, & its some how even brighter! So far.. it’s awesome :) The only thing i would have to say “negatively” & not that it’s negative in anyway.. is that there is no scent to it. It does not make your hair smell good, but it also doesn’t make your hair smell bad. Your hair literally just smells like hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A whole bottle of awesome!
reviews.reviewText: I've used this once and my hair feels amazing. It's so soft, shiny, and smells great. I have a natural wave in my hair that makes it almost impossible to control the frizz. This shampoo and conditioner did it. That's saying a lot considering how many products I've went through. Honestly, I used less of this than I did my go to shampoo and conditioner. The smell isn't overwhelming. I have a sensitive nose and this doesn't irritate me at all. My scalp feels clean and not dry. I definitely recommend these products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Fácil de aplicar y deja el cabello súper suave

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cleans hair, but nothing special
reviews.reviewText: I have long, fine, straight hair that has a tendency to frizz and tangle and am always on the lookout for shampoos that will help give me a little volume and smoothness. This was recommended in an article about shampoos for fine hair and was a reasonable price, so I figured I'd try it out. Overall I am unimpressed.-The Shampoo cleans my hair just fine and the Conditioner does feel like it works nicely through my hair, but there is zero difference in the body of my hair and it made the frizz worse.-If you like a very foamy shampoo this is not for you, but I tend to stay away from most of the ingredients that make things foamy, so not a big deal for me.-The Scent in the bottle was almost overwhelmingly perfumey and unpleasant, and I almost returned it just for that. But I gave it a try and it's fine when actually used in the shower and doesn't linger in my hair, so that's fine.I will finish out these bottles because they're fine and do the job of cleaning my hair, and I can combat the frizz with a couple of drops of hemi-squalane on the ends, but they do not do their explicit job of adding volume, so I will be unlikely to bother buying them again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I was skeptical... I will use this stuff for awhile.
reviews.reviewText: Love Monday Hair care. RECOMMEND FOR ANYONE WITH DAMAGED HAIR. MAKES MY HAIR REALLY BOUNCY AND SHINY WITHOUT MAKING IT OILY AND I HAVE NOTICED MY DRY SCALP HAS GOTTEN SO MUCH BETTER IN THE LAST 4WEEKS COMPARED TO USING PRIOR SHAMPOOS... I LOVE THE PUMP BOTTLES ALSO!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product and value!
reviews.reviewText: My hair is super soft and thin. Finding a shampoo and conditioner that brings volume, feel, and texture is very hard. This set does the trick! I am very pleasantly surprised!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Smelled Great But Made Hair Disgusting
reviews.reviewText: I have very fine hair that is prone to oily roots and thought this might be a good budget solution for me. The packaging is super cute and I love the pump dispenser. The scent of these are AMAZING - I love it so much that I wish I could get it in a perfume or something. The shampoo lathers up really well, but never actually feels like it washes out or gets the hair clean and the conditioner didn't seem to do much. After a shower, I was left with matted and knotted up hair that took forever to brush out which is unusual for me. I used the shampoo and conditioner together for about a week and it ended up making my hair insanely greasy at the roots and sticky/hard to brush through at the ends. It also made my scalp dry and itchy, giving me dandruff which I have never had a problem with. While I absolutely love the smell of this, the performance of this duo was by far the worst that I have experienced in about as long as I can remember. I am not sure how this is so popular!?

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not for me
reviews.reviewText: I really wanted to believe this would help my extremely oily hair but it did not. It did help with volume but my hair just felt coarse and gross after each wash. The scent is nice but too light for my liking. I like a strong scented shampoo. My hair is very fine so that may be the issue but it just did not do anything good for me.
